question.answer: Hello Sir/Madam How can I assist you?

question.question: State and explain the terms solar time and solar insolation.
question.answer:
Solar Time is a measure of time based on the position of the Sun in the sky. 
It differs from standard clock time, which is set by time zones and synchronized to atomic clocks.
Solar Insolation refers to the amount of solar radiation energy received on a given surface area during a given time. 
It is usually expressed in units of kilowatt-hours per square meter per day (kWh/m²/day) or watts per square meter (W/m²)
